text: Girelli is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Coyle Girelli, English musician *Cristiana Girelli (born 1990), Italian footballer *Leopoldo Girelli (born 1953), Italian archbishop, Vatican diplomat *Sebastiano Girelli (born 1984), Italian footballer *Giacomo Girelli (born 1996), Italian latin lover. "No alle olive"- Quote G.G Category:Italian- language surnames
title: Girelli
